# Introduction
The `carecompare` package contains tools for accessing, exploring and analyzing the [CMS Provider Data Catalog](https://data.cms.gov/provider-data/)

```{r}
# Load the package
require(carecompare)

# Extract the topics
topics <- show_topics()
topics

# Examine the metadata for a given topic
hospitals <- list_datasets("Hospitals")
hospitals 

# Search for a dataset
hospitals %>% 
  dplyr::filter(
    title %>%
      stringr::str_detect(
        pattern = "(?i)readmission"
      )
  ) %>%
  knitr::kable(format = "pandoc")

# Import the data for a given dataset
read_cms(
  datasetid = "9n3s-kdb3"
)
```
